duties_responsibilities.duty: Responsible for the execution of strategic direction, development, and performance of inside sales activities in assigned markets.
Work collectively with the Inside Sales Supervisor to staff and direct the inside sales team.
Provide leadership towards the achievement of maximum profitability and growth with customers in line with the Company’s vision and values.
Ensure execution of plans and strategies to expand customer base and contribute to the development of training and educational programs for clients and inside sales personnel.
Execute and manage business plan and sales strategy for branch to ensure attainment of company sales goals and profitability.
Plan and strategically partner with selected supplier partners to ensure achievement of mutual growth plans.
Serve as coach and mentor to inside sales personnel.
Promote vision by providing customers with creative and broad-based solutions to assist in achieving their goals.
Work collectively with inside sales and field sales leaders to ensure effective communication within the branch.
Oversee performance and development of the inside sales team.
Prepare action plans for inside sales team for effective search of sales leads and prospects.
Identify and create new sales initiatives and execute sales strategies to penetrate new markets.
Assist in the implementation of marketing plans.
Maintain accurate records of pricings, sales, and activity reports submitted by the sales team.
Maintain contact with clients in market area to ensure high levels of client satisfaction.

education_certification.credential: High School Degree or equivalent required; Bachelor’s Degree preferred
